com.ecs.utils
Class ECSException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.ecs.utils.ECSException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ECSException
extends java.lang.Exception

The class implements an ECS specific exception which can be used in custom code for generating custom exceptions.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Gordon Sandeman
